subject: NHAI Policy Guidelines Strengthening PIUs for acquisition of land/2017.
text: Hndy 7e14 <Totarf 711eenror Phone 81-*1-25074100n5074200 (8377 WA0t & Toanf tntz) Fax 91-11-2509350T 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport &nd Highways) i-5 & 6, #azr-10 , aan, 38 fotm-710075 6-5 & 6, Secton-10, Dwarka New Delh-110075 No.11014/11/2016-HR Date: 31.07.2017 CORRIGENDUM Please refer to the Policy Guidelines dated 28.07.2017 regarding "strengthening PIUs for acquisition of land" (copy enclosed). The Ref . number of the said Policy Guidelines may please be read as 7.1.53/2017 instead of 7.1.52/2017. 2_ The rest of the contents of the said guidelines shall remain unchanged. (A.K: Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Coordination) Encl: As above. To All Officers of HQ ROs PIUs CMUs Site Offices. to: (i) GM (LAGEM) (ii) Sr. Librarian Copy
